title: Honestly I don't even care about winning anymore
body:
I just care about doing well. If I win lane, keep global presence, split push, team fight well, and counter-build to the best of my ability and still lose, I'm happy with that. I did my best.

I used to have the perfect bronze mentality and thought I was hot shit... Blaming my team, keeping a static build, only caring about k/d while still 'trying' to win...

I just smh when I see people with that same mentality
